content:
ICS 1C HW 3 for QQ Skeleton -- Heading

About QQ Skeleton

Name:Matthew Rauch
E-mail: easu1578@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: Economics

Three neat Web finds:

  1. oac homepage
  2. Nine Planets
  3. Real Estate

Questions I can now answer
  1. If I want to finance my own business, where can get help in financing the equipment?
  2. Where can I get a good pair of deckhandboots?
  3. What is Lynx?
  4. How many people are affiliated with the University of Grenada in Spain?
  5. Where could I go to pan for gold in Alaska?
  1. If I want to finance my own business, wher can I get help in financing the equipment?
    Being an economics major, starting my own business is something that I want to do. Using Yahoo, I was able to find global leasing services. They help finance equipment anywhere in the range of $25,000 to $10 million. The WWW is very useful in the Return to list of questions.
  2. Where can I get a good pair of deckhand boots?
    Izorline International Inc. offers a shorty 100% rubber boot that they say is perfect for the southern California angler. A good pair of deckhand boots are essential when fishing on an ocean. boat because keeping dry as well as maintaining good footing is important. Izorline also offers many other fishing and boating accessories, and it would be cool to order things from a computer via mosaic.

    Return to list of questions.

  3. What is Lynx?
    Lynxis a browser that is used on the World Wide Web. It is a user friendly hypertext interface for users on unix and vms platforms. It can run gopher, HTTP, WAIS, FTP, or NNTP. Lynx is also a client program. Browsers are important for the user to "surf the Web".Other examples of browsers such as Lynx are Mosaic and Cello. We always use Mosaic, but why not Lynx?

    Return to list of questions.

  4. How many people are affiliated with the University of Grenada in Spain?
    There are approximately sixty thousand faculy, students, and staff that are currently involved with the University of Grenada. The university has a rich history, being part of the Roman, Islamic, and Nazi empires. The university also has an Economics department, which focuses on the economic situation of Europe. This is of interest to me because I would be intersted in going to school in Spain. I found the university by looking up Spain and universities in Yahoo Search.

    Return to list of questions.

  5. Where could I go to pan for gold in Alaska?
    Adventure awaits you in the north. You could fulfill a fantasy by panning for gold in the wilderness by taking the 1995 Alaska Gold Prospecting Adventure. By calling the 1-800 number provided, you will see that there is a great deal offered. With all supplies furnished, you not only are guaranteed to find gold, but also get to see Alaska and get free fishing lessons! I want to spend my summer in Alaska, so I surfed the web and looked for an area of interst.

    Return to list of questions.

Submitted February 08, 1995 for ICS 1C
